title: Kmiller62571
author: Kmiller62571
content: Not Sure if this will happen. Or if anyone will be Interested I have  Nearly 300 Old lp Albums from the 50's-90's im Selling Most Albums are in Good + Shape Some are like Prestine Played one time Covers some are Worn out for having for over 50 years there is A lot of 1st Pressing albums And albums from Germany, Uk London , Usa, Canada Few other Countries Also have around 200-275 Cassette Tapes from this era Mostly Classic rock Woodstock Days music Some Really Good Stuff examplesLed ZepplinThe Rolling StonesJimi HendrixThe DoorsThe WhoJethro TullAmericaFirefallTrafficSteppenwolfStyxVan HalenZZtopBostonIron Maiden Powerslave 1st pressing ........Etc If you are interested i would send you My full list along with details of everything about the album the Whole History of the Album where was Printed at The Pressing Everything Of course to make a deal we wouldd have to go through a Escrow of some kind Im excepting Btc and i prefer Btc I will except ethereum. Tron . Doge. BnB SMART CHAIN. solana. Avalanche, Usdt., etc........I would ship theses out after payment is made through a escrow service  packaged very well  Internationaly we will split shipping fee if this is okay with Buyer if you have any questions or would like me to send a list of what i have leave a message here after the beep.................................................................Beeeeeeeee eeeeeeeeeeeeeeep!Thank You And sorry for my spelling im very very Busy Hunting Wabbits.............

comments.author: aoluain
comments.created_time: February 17, 2023, 11:46:30 PMLast edit: February 20, 2023, 07:46:27 PM by aoluain
comments.body: I might be interested in some LP's.From your list above I would be interested in some Tull LP's, is it all Rock you have?Would also be interested in some Thin Lizzy, Rory Gallagher and Horslips thats a long shot I know...Also where are you shipping from, Europe, US, GB, Australia/New Zealand?If you are in Europe I would be even more interested, that way I wont have to pay tax and duty!

comments.author: Kmiller62571
comments.body: I am Located In United States, I will check international prices and in the meantime I will work on posting a list I do have some very pricey old Punk Rock albums though i definitely am not ready to let go of though Sex Pistols, Misfits, Joy Division, Dead Kennedy's, Butthole Surfers....ets I will get back here asap thank you

comments.author: BobbyCoins
comments.body: This section is for crypto related collectibles like https://scarce.city/marketplace/physical/the-bitcoin-record and https://hodlr.rocks/satoshi-series/the-invisible-hand-series-of-12/There is a 12" Bitcoin record out there (limited to 250 pcs. or so). If you've got that one to sell => people might be interested...Otherwise use https://www.discogs.com like everybody else on this planet.

comments.author: Kmiller62571
comments.body: i don't believe Discogs Deals in Crypto first off second like i said i apologize and was not sure about where to post this second don't be a dick you don't even know me to even think about being a dick toward me anyways just delete this post im good on the scammer situation and the jokes are over !!  it's not hard to find honest and respectful people to deal with the  thing is i actually posted this to see if the one that has compromised the email attached to this account would make a move and i got my answer Thanks BitcoinTalk

comments.author: buckrogers
comments.body: Quote from: Kmiller62571 on February 24, 2023, 11:24:04 PMi don't believe Discogs Deals in Crypto first off second like i said i apologize and was not sure about where to post this second don't be a dick you don't even know me to even think about being a dick toward me anyways just delete this post im good on the scammer situation and the jokes are over !!  it's not hard to find honest and respectful people to deal with the  thing is i actually posted this to see if the one that has compromised the email attached to this account would make a move and i got my answer Thanks BitcoinTalk Wait, what happened?Who did what with an email?Not sure about anyone else who posted garbage here, thinking they are some version of the “forum police” but I am genuinely interested and you can DM me with info, I believe I sent you a DM as well inquiring about a specific LP.Please don’t let 1 person’s post upset you, that’s not how things work here.If a moderator feels that you should move your thread to a different section such as “goods” then they will let you know, until then you’re fine.I am still interested, so feel free to reach out, or reply to my DM.Thanks!

comments.author: ChiBitCTy
comments.body: Quote from: buckrogers on February 25, 2023, 12:53:09 AMQuote from: Kmiller62571 on February 24, 2023, 11:24:04 PMi don't believe Discogs Deals in Crypto first off second like i said i apologize and was not sure about where to post this second don't be a dick you don't even know me to even think about being a dick toward me anyways just delete this post im good on the scammer situation and the jokes are over !!  it's not hard to find honest and respectful people to deal with the  thing is i actually posted this to see if the one that has compromised the email attached to this account would make a move and i got my answer Thanks BitcoinTalk Wait, what happened?Who did what with an email?Not sure about anyone else who posted garbage here, thinking they are some version of the “forum police” but I am genuinely interested and you can DM me with info, I believe I sent you a DM as well inquiring about a specific LP.Please don’t let 1 person’s post upset you, that’s not how things work here.If a moderator feels that you should move your thread to a different section such as “goods” then they will let you know, until then you’re fine.I am still interested, so feel free to reach out, or reply to my DM.Thanks!Yeah I’m confused too when it comes to the email thing. @kmiller.. you’re fine having posted it here. This section is for collectibles, which is exactly what you have here. This is a topic that’s been discussed by the moderators quite a few times over the years and the main rules are it needs to be a collectible of some type and you must be willing to accept bitcoin as payment. Cheers

comments.author: buckrogers
comments.body: Quote from: aoluain on February 21, 2023, 07:25:38 AMQuote from: BobbyCoins on February 21, 2023, 01:23:35 AMThis section is for crypto related collectibles like https://scarce.city/marketplace/physical/the-bitcoin-record and https://hodlr.rocks/satoshi-series/the-invisible-hand-series-of-12/There is a 12" Bitcoin record out there (limited to 250 pcs. or so). If you've got that one to sell => people might be interested...Otherwise use https://www.discogs.com like everybody else on this planet.This is the Collectibles boardTo me thats, 1st edition books, Magazines, Newspapers, Pens, Stamps, Coins, Banknotes, Cameras, Tools, Speakers, Jewellery, Gems, Buttons, Tshirts, Sneakers....anything vintage, anything collectible, anything rare....and collectible crypto items They all fit in this board100%, and we’ve seen a lot of whacky things for sale here in the Collectibles section over the years, I think Vinyl Records are on the normal/tame side of things where that’s concerned, and as a “collector of things”, I have many collectible records and welcome them here personally. Silly to post otherwise, and to say it in such a negative way that may deter a newcomer to the space is simply not ok, and pretty “uncool”, especially from a member who has been here almost as long as I have. I look forward to your list @Kmiller62571 should you still want to share it.Thanks!

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: if it is deemed a "collectible" either by rarity, vintage or w/e method used and BTC is an acceptable form of payment, I would say they are in the right area of the forums - could it fit under "Goods"? Sure but by being vintage possibly rare LP's and they do accept BTC - it fits here as well.

comments.author: Kmiller62571
comments.body: I'm sorry for the delay here I will definitely send private dm to the ones interested in these items I have 3 storage buildings filled with vintage and antique items these came from me buying some houses and items where located in them and some are from storage building I bought also from my family and friends of mine items that I have bought I haveany items and I. Willing to do escrow or local pickup within 50 miles maybe further I'm preparing a monster list of items I would like only honest people to deal with as I have put loads of work for not this and.money much much time I have had 2 laptops destroyed much crypto stollen my IRA investments retirement and airdrops and Microsoft and Google counts all breached and compromised the authorities and my attorney are working on the case and the criminals read anything I try to do and get involved and try to sabotage or set me up for many things it's been.hell but now everything is being watched in every way so if your reading this we will see how far you really want to go and I will dm the people interested in these items thanks sorry for delay and grammar here

Willing to do escrow or local pickup within 50 miles maybe further I'm preparing a monster list of items I would like only honest people to deal with as I have put loads of work for not this and.money much much time I have had 2 laptops destroyed much crypto stollen my IRA investments retirement and airdrops and Microsoft and Google counts all breached and compromised the authorities and my attorney are working on the case and the criminals read anything I try to do and get involved and try to sabotage or set me up for many things it's been.hell but now everything is being watched in every way so if your reading this we will see how far you really want to go and I will dm the people interested in these items thanks sorry for delay and grammar here Wow, sorry for your troubles, sounds like multiple hits on multiple fronts. Can't imagine even dealing with that, sorry again. Anyhow, some are interested, but you just need to post a list or something, details like your relatvie location etc etc... I'm psyched to hear you got much of this for free, it's insane how much vinyl is forgotten in warehouses and storage units TBH... Thanks and hope things improve, keep up the good fight mate! And no worries, we patient peoples.
